title: Interpretation of a sickle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scythe for harvesting or catching it and hitting the scythe with the scythe. Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq says that the interpretation of seeing a scythe in a dream is a means by which one can gain money and good living. Seeing it indicates wealth and honest news. Perhaps it denotes the harvest of a lifetime. If you see a sickle in your dream, this foretells that an accident or illness will prevent you from taking care of your affairs or going on trips. If you see a broken or old sickle, this foretells the separation of friends or failure in a business deal. And whoever sees a sickle, it denotes On the arrival of a machine from which he sees abundant food, and he can interpret it as crooked in his affairs. As it is said among people: If you stand, then you have a knife, and if you bend down, then you have a sickle. Interpretation of seeing a sickle in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing gold in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream of seeing gold in a dream by the leading interpretation scholars is a correct scientific interpretation, as gold is a type of adornment that women wear, and gold is one of the most precious and valuable things in life, but all of this is in reality, but what about the interpretation of a dream about gold in a dream? This vision certainly carries many different signs and indicators in our lives, so we will discuss in detail what is the interpretation of a dream about seeing gold in a dream for unmarried, pregnant and divorced women, as well as the interpretation of the dream. Of stolen gold, and what is the interpretation of seeing gold in a dream in white, and what is the interpretation of a dream of seeing gold lost or broken, and many dreams about gold that we will find in this text. Interpretation of a dream of seeing gold by Ibn Sirin. Seeing gold in a dream indicates children, and also that Gold in a dream indicates boys, and silver in a dream indicates girls. Whoever sees gold coins in a dream, this indicates that he will meet the governor or president. Seeing gold in a dream means that the dreamer will take a prominent position in the state. If one sees in his dream that he took gold From another person, this indicates that the dreamer will overcome the problems he will face. As for seeing gold lost in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will lose someone who was close to him and deserved his love. Interpretation of a dream about seeing gold by Ibn Shaheen. As for seeing gold in a dream, it is evidence of haste. The dreamer is about to cut ties with someone in his life. As for seeing a golden ring in a dream, it is an indication of the marriage of an unmarried person and good offspring for a married person. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lot of gold in a dream is evidence that he will earn a lot of money in his life. As for seeing a little gold in a The dream is evidence that he is spending his money unjustly. Seeing finding gold is evidence that the dreamer will succeed, but in a short time. Interpretation of seeing gold by the scientist MillerThe scientist Miller showed in his interpretation of seeing gold in a dream that it shows his victory in his work. As for seeing a gold mine in a dream, This means eating away the rights of others. A woman who sees that she has received a gift of gold is evidence of her marriage to a rich but greedy person. Interpretation of a dream of losing gold in a dream and proof that the dreamer will lose many valuable opportunities in his life. Interpretation of seeing gold for a man. As for someone who sees a gold ring in His dream indicates marriage to a single man and good offspring from a married man. Gold in a dream also indicates leadership and success for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams that she bought a gold chain, this means that her younger sister will get married. If she has no younger brothers From her, this dream of hers indicates that she will get married that year and give birth to good offspring. Interpretation of a dream about gold for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is buying gold and storing it, this means that her eldest son will get married. But if she dreams that she is buying a gold watch, this is a sign of her daughter’s marriage. Interpretation A pregnant woman’s dream of gold: Interpretation of seeing gold for a pregnant woman in a dream as evidence that her due date is approaching. Seeing a beautiful golden ring in shape and appearance, studded with diamonds, in a bitter dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a dinosaur in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dinosaur in a dream. The dinosaur is a huge animal that lived in the past era and exists now only as fossils. Seeing it in a dream indicates problems, fears, and problems. Chasing the dreamer shows the presence of enemies and friends, cunning and deception. Escaping from the dinosaur indicates freedom from enemies and troubles, and the death of neglect and sadness. Escape from the interpretation of a dream about dinosaurs for a single woman. A dinosaur in a dream refers to the enemy and a deceitful, deceitful person. An unmarried person’s vision of a dinosaur indicates that there is someone in her life who is trying to deceive her, and it may indicate the failure of a romantic relationship or the cancellation of an engagement. Seeing a dinosaur chasing a girl indicates the presence of bad people. In her life. Interpretation of a dream about escaping from a dinosaur for a married woman. Seeing a dinosaur is considered one of the bad visions and indicates that he will be exposed to troubles and problems. If one sees that he is escaping from the dinosaur, this indicates getting rid of problems, worries and troubles. Seeing a green dinosaur indicates the girl’s marriage to a young man of good character. Interpretation Dreaming of a dinosaur attack: Seeing dinosaurs attacking the dreamer indicates the presence of bad people around the dreamer and causing him trouble and trouble. It also indicates the presence of many enemies of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a very large dinosaur. Seeing a large dinosaur in a dream indicates psychological disturbances and crises to which the viewer is exposed. Escaping from a dinosaur in a dream It means that the dreamer will get rid of problems. Interpretation of a dream about a dinosaur: Seeing a dinosaur in a divorced dream may indicate troubles and troubles that the divorced person will be exposed to. The vision also shows a cunning person in her life. Seeing yourself running away from a dinosaur in a dream can indicate a good future, comfort, peace and stability. Interpretation A dream of a small dinosaur for a single woman: Seeing dinosaurs in a dream is one of the visions that bring goodness and evil. Seeing a small dinosaur in a dream indicates suffering and exhaustion, unless it is a cause of benefit to the fortuneteller, in which case it indicates goodness. Seeing distance from the dinosaur or escaping from it indicates a mood of worries and sorrow. Interpretation of a dream about a small dinosaur for a married woman: Seeing a dinosaur in a dream for a married woman indicates many marital problems and conflicts. Also, seeing dinosaurs for a married woman indicates the presence of evil people in her life who hold her in hatred, hostility, and resentment. Interpretation of a dream about a dinosaur for a man: Seeing a dinosaur in a married man’s dream means that life With him, you will stumble, get tired, and suffer. It also indicates the presence of cunning people and deceivers who cause him trouble and trouble. Running away from a dinosaur for a man indicates getting rid of worries and spending debts. Interpretation of a dream about a dinosaur for a young man: Seeing a dinosaur in a young man’s dream indicates a difficult situation that the young man finds himself in, and it may indicate leaving him. Job or problems in the work environment. Chasing a young dinosaur indicates the deterioration of his health and psychological condition, and may indicate that he will not obtain the academic title of a student. Interpretation of a dream about a dinosaur for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant dinosaur could indicate a miscarriage. Escaping from a dinosaur means the death of worry and anxiety and getting rid of Pregnancy fatigue and

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman: Although a dream about adultery with an unknown person causes fear and astonishment in the soul, the interpretation of the dream and determining its precise meaning is governed by many criteria that you can learn about and reach the meaning in detail through this article, and review Ibn Sirin’s sayings in each Related to the interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman.Interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown womanThe interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman indicates many unwanted repercussions related to the dreamer’s life and actions in reality. Immorality symbolizes his confusion in his life with reckless decisions and irresponsible actions and turning away from the corner of God, ignoring worship. And lust. Committing some sins without fear; Because adultery is one of the signs of revealing the veil. The loss of blessings and goodness from the dreamer’s life, especially if he commits the immoral act without feeling fear or remorse, is in addition one of the indications that he is turning away from the pleasures of the world without thinking or controlling the desires of the soul. Interpretation of the dream of adultery with an unknown woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin continues to interpret the dream of adultery with an unknown woman as one of the dreams that carries a warning message and advises the dreamer to be accountable and turn to God. Because adultery expresses a wrong path that he actually takes, revealing his matter and hiding it from men, if he does not have the intention of sincere repentance, and it also indicates earning money through illegal means that God is not pleased with. But they continue to pursue it with a desire to achieve more. The interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman carries a message warning of the consequences of the wrong actions he takes in reality, the consequences of which he will bear, and an invitation to start from the beginning and completely abandon this. Way before it is too late for the soul, this dream also reveals the worries and crises that haunt the dreamer in reality as a result of the hateful actions he committed against himself and those around him. The specialized Dream Interpretation Secrets website offers a selection of the leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Secrets of Dream Interpretation website in Google. Interpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman. A dream about adultery with an unknown woman shows a man his desire for sexual intercourse and marriage, and his mind is very preoccupied with this matter. His life companion, even if it is an ugly woman. The dream here indicates many burdens and responsibilities that fall on his shoulders and do not leave him the freedom to live and work. Because he does not have the luxury of choosing and determining what he wants to keep or give up.Interpretation of a dream about adultery for an unknown single womanInterpretation of a dream about adultery with an unknown woman in an unmarried woman’s dream shows bad company following her path and gradually beginning to follow her, violating her upbringing and values, as if the dream was an alarm bell protecting her . And withdrawing from her before it is too late, this also means that she is committing some wrong actions and refraining from performing acts of worship and she must wake up from this neglect, as the dream indicates a weak character and confusion in making important decisions in her life. But it requires seeking help and advice and not...

title: Interpretation of seeing adultery in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of adultery in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted the act of adultery in a dream as that it could indicate an act of disobedience or betrayal to someone or greed, and it could also indicate some positive things. This indicates the dreamer’s greed in obtaining money or stealing from him, and adultery can have a good meaning and good news. If a man sees himself committing adultery with a woman he does not know, and whoever sees in his dream that he refuses adultery, this is evidence of losing worries and problems, and overcoming problems. Which he faces. Other interpretations of adultery in a dream. Whoever dreams in a dream that he committed adultery and was punished, this proves the high status of the dreamer and his holding a great position. If he sees himself committing adultery with a girl he does not know, this is evidence that he will marry a beautiful girl who has a fair wife. Interpretation of adultery in A dream for a single woman: Scientists have interpreted a dream about an unmarried girl committing adultery as an indication of her intense desire to get married, or it may be meaningless dreams, or it may be an imminent marriage. Interpretation of adultery in a dream for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of adultery can be interpreted as a desire to make decisions She relates to herself without interference from anyone, and a married woman’s dream of adultery can be interpreted as passing problems and trials in her marital life that may expose her to separation or divorce. The interpretation of this dream may be to preserve her feelings towards her husband and her love for him. Interpretation of a dream about adultery with a man: Seeing someone committing adultery with A man he knows in a dream is evidence that he is committing an evil act or that it will help him defeat his enemies, and seeing adultery with someone he does not know is evidence of sustenance and happiness.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream that my brother’s wife is pregnant in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that my brother’s wife was pregnant. My brother’s wife has a prestigious position and position, and when he sees her pregnant in a dream, he has many indicators and signs that we will present in different cases in this article, through which we will know what the symbol will be, if it is good. Or bad for this dreamer, with the exception of interpretations and explanations belonging to the great scholars and interpreters, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that my brother’s wife is pregnant. Seeing that my brother’s wife is pregnant has many connotations and signs that can be identified from the following cases: The dreamer who sees in a dream that her brother’s wife is pregnant is a sign For a lot of good and abundant money that you will get in the coming period. Seeing her brother’s wife pregnant in a dream indicates getting rid of worries, the end of the troubles and worries that the dreamer suffered from, and enjoying a calm and stable life. If a woman sees that her brother’s wife is pregnant and giving birth in a dream, This symbolizes the abundance of food and her condition will change for the better. I dreamed that my brother’s wife was pregnant with her son Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin discusses the interpretation of the brother’s wife’s pregnancy in a dream, and the following are some of the interpretations that came from him: My brother’s wife is pregnant in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is a vision that indicates that God will grant her Her good, blessed and good offspring in the future. If the dreamer sees in a dream that her brother’s wife is pregnant, this symbolizes hearing good news and the arrival of joys and happy occasions for her. Seeing a brother’s wife being pregnant in a dream indicates the end of a difficult period in her life and the beginning of a new phase full of optimism and hope. She dreamed That my brother’s wife is pregnant with Nabulsi is one of the most important and prominent interpreters who dealt with the pregnancy of his brother’s wife in a dream with Nabulsi, so we will present some of his opinions on this symbol: The pregnancy of her brother’s wife in a dream for Nabulsi indicates kindness and abundant companionship for her from work or legal inheritance. Seeing one’s brother’s wife The dreamer in a dream means achieving the desires, dreams and goals that she has sought so much. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his brother’s wife is pregnant, this symbolizes that she will have good job opportunities that will make her life better. I dreamed that my brother’s wife is pregnant with Ibn Shaheen, and Ibn Shaheen has several sayings about the wife’s pregnancy His brother in a dream, including: Ibn Shaheen explains that seeing her brother’s wife pregnant in a dream indicates the blessing she will receive in her life, her money, and her child. If the dreamer sees in a dream that her brother’s wife is pregnant and bleeding, this symbolizes the presence of people around her who hate her and hate her, and she must take care of them. Seeing her brother’s wife pregnant in a dream indicates a decent and luxurious life that she will enjoy in her life. The dreamer who sees in a dream that his brother’s wife is a sign of his promotion at work and the acquisition of abundant and lawful money. I dreamed that my brother’s wife is pregnant. The interpretation of a brother’s wife being pregnant in a dream varies according to the marital status For the dreamer, and then we will interpret the appearance of this symbol by the unmarried girl: An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that her brother’s wife is pregnant, indicates positive changes that will happen to her in the coming period, which will make her happy and happy.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow in a dream is a cloth bag stuffed with cotton, fiber, sponge, or any other type, provided that it is comfortable when sleeping on it. People often meet in their dreams when they see the pillow and wonder about this vision, and today we will provide you with an explanation of the scholars’ vision of the pillow for the mother. You can watch: Interpretation of dreams to see a short man Interpretation of the dream of the pillow by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin’s explanation in the interpretation of scholars seeing the pillow in a dream, because it symbolizes children, as scholars indicate. The dreamer’s dream of a large pillow indicates the arrival of wealth and wealth. The dream of buying a pillow for the mother indicates that she will get married soon. The dream of buying a pillow that is not good indicates the arrival of worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream of a pillow for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman buying a pillow or a pillow in a dream indicates the good friendship between her and her friend. The dream of an unmarried woman that she gives her a pillow in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and security. Seeing an unmarried woman washing a pillowcase indicates the approaching date of her engagement. Seeing an unmarried woman in her sleep and a lost pillow is evidence of the coming of efforts and fears. Or seeing her as if she is driving the pillow is a reminder that she has wronged someone close to her and does not know it. Seeing the pillow in white indicates her medical fame among people. Seeing the pillow in pink indicates the arrival of happiness and an abundance of goodness. It indicates Dreaming of a silk pillow indicates that she will marry a man who has a lot of money and wealth. Seeing a pillow made of wool indicates how close one is to Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about a pillow for a married woman A married woman's dream about a pillow indicates that she will give birth to sons and daughters. Dreaming of a blue pillow indicates the arrival of abundant sustenance and money. Seeing a green pillow cover indicates that she and her partner are traveling to another country. A white pillow in a married woman's dream is evidence of her happiness and love. Seeing the purchase of pillows in a married woman's dream is good news and good news for her. Interpretation of a dream about a pillow for a pregnant woman Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow A pregnant woman who sees a white or pink pillow indicates that she has given birth to a girl. A pregnant woman's dream about a blue pillow indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Seeing an abundance of pillows in the dreamer is evidence of the abundance of her offspring. Seeing only two pillows in her dream indicates that she has already given birth to twins.

title: Interpretation of pain in a dream The meaning of pain in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming of abdominal pain in the dream of single and married women and pregnant women, toothache, back pain, leg pain, pain in the left leg, pain in the right leg, and pain in the arm. Interpretation of a dream about pain in a dream Aches and pains in a dream generally symbolize The sadness that the dreamer feels about a certain thing that happened to him recently, what happened a while ago and he still feels guilty about it. Pain in a dream can indicate bad speech and a bad reputation associated with the dreamer and his moral path, and a dream about a toothache can be one of the most important dreams that reveal About this incident. The pain in the dreamer’s neck indicates the dreamer’s bad relationship with others in real life, causing him major problems in their lives. Whoever sees in a dream that he feels pain in his head, this is evidence of his betrayal of someone close to him, on different levels, and he feels remorse for This action. Whoever dreams of suffering from abdominal pain while sleeping, this indicates that he is spending money in an improper and improper way and that he will be exposed to some health problems in the near future. Whoever dreams that he feels sharp pain in the chest, this indicates that he is suffering from some problems in the chest. His emotional relationship or in his domestic and familial relationship with his wife. Severe pain in a dream, which the dreamer is completely experiencing, indicates the imminent death of one of the people he knows, whether on a family or social level. Interpretation of pain in a dream If you dream that you feel pain, this means that you are not Happy in your life, this dream means that you will regret in vain some foolishness you have committed. And if you see others in pain in your dream, this means that you are making mistakes in your life. Interpretation of severe pain in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of pain or sufferingPain or pain has a meaning, and many people dream of pain, meaning that it is a common dream and not surprising. This is not a good dream as some people think. It means stress and pleasure combined, but the stress will be more than the pleasure. If you are experiencing excruciating pain due to the loss of money or property, this means that annoying and imaginary fears will burden you due to the annoying condition of your affairs or the illness of a dear relative. Pain: sadness over sin, and it was said: whoever sees that he is resting is tired. Ibn Sirin said that seeing pain In a dream, it indicates the hardships that the dreamer is going through in his life, or perhaps the hardships that his children are going through. If you dream that you are in pain, it means that you are very hesitant in your work and that someone else is taking advantage of your ideas. If a girl dreams that she is suffering from heart pain, this foretells that she will become severely depressed from the late trip in which her lover asks for her hand in marriage. If the pain is in the back, he will face illness through reckless exposure. If he had a headache, there would be great concern about the risk he took to get out of the competition. This dream is due to physical reasons and has little significance. Whoever dreams that one of his molars hurts, this means that he will hear bad things from his relatives. If one dreams

title: Seeing a dead mother in a dream

preview.html: If the dreamer goes through many difficult circumstances, this indicates the compensation he will receive and that he will be free of problems and pain in his life for a long time, and if the deceased mother smiles in the dream, this indicates good news and food for him. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream for a single girl: If you see a woman in a dream that The mother died in a dream and she is alive in waking life. It indicates that she feels great loneliness at this time, and that she feels hopeless and sad in her life. And if an unmarried woman is going through some bad circumstances at the present time, and she sees the dead mother in a dream. This is an indication of The great reward that God sends to her in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried woman sees that her mother has died and in reality she is dead, her relief from all the problems she is experiencing will appear. She will get rid of all the worries that she is experiencing, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a dead mother in a dream is for a girl. Alone. A sign of the great success that she will see in her life. And that this matter will worry her greatly, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation and meaning of seeing a living or dead mother in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her mother died in a dream. And I felt very sorry for her. It indicates the problems that this married woman faces in her life. If a married woman sees in a dream that the dead mother is really alive. The meaning indicates that there are things that she is afraid to hear or see now. And the married woman who sees in a dream that she is standing in Her dead mother’s washing machine. It appears here that she is free of all the diseases she is experiencing and the problems she is going through. And seeing the dead mother laughing loudly in a dream, and she was already dead. It is an indication of the comfort with which the dead mother lives in the Sunnah, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a dead mother In a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees in a dream that her deceased mother was sitting in her house and is afraid of her. It shows something that worries this woman who is dreaming, and it will happen now, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if the divorced woman washes the dead mother in the dream and she is happy about doing this. It indicates her morale. High in all the sad things that a divorced woman will experience. And if the divorced woman is going through some bad things, and sees her deceased mother smiling at her in a dream. This is an indication that these matters will be canceled in the near future, God willing. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that the dead mother was sad in the dream. What is meant is to ask for alms and supplication for her in the afterlife, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream for a man and its meaningIf the dreamer sees in a dream that his deceased mother was desperately asking to see him. It indicates that this dreamer must visit His dead mother in life and to pray for her always. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that the dead mother was sitting and talking to him a lot. This is an indication that there are good things that he will see in his life, God willing. And the dreamer who looks at the dead mother and was alive when she was alive.

title: Interpretation of seeing cows in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cows in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a cow in a dream for single women indicates a close marriage with a good person, even if the cow in the dream is a lean cow, this indicates bad luck and misfortune. And seeing a white cow in a dream, this indicates a close commitment, and a black cow mentions a girl’s work. Interpretation of seeing a cow in A dream for a pregnant woman. Who sees a cow in a dream? Pregnant. In the first months, she was beautiful and beautiful, grazing in a green orchard. This indicates the ease of childbirth and the passage of the pregnancy without fatigue, or the newborn will often be male and visually. Cows are light or dark in color. This indicates in the dream that God will bless them with a female. Interpretation of seeing a cow. For a married woman: Seeing cows in a dream for a married woman is a sign of kindness, joy, happiness, and abundance of food. A pregnant cow: This indicates a lot of money and family income. Interpreters interpreted seeing cows in a dream for a married woman, which symbolizes her family, good neighbors, close friends, and those around her, as well as About the security and stability that she enjoys. Seeing cows inherited in a dream shows a lot of money that the wife will earn. And who does she see in her dreams? A pasture full of cows. This indicates the peace of mind and tranquility that she enjoys. Interpretation of seeing a white cow in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a white cow in a woman’s dream is different. For a married woman, this indicates the nearness of marriage, and if the dreamer is a man, this is a sign of success and wealth, and if he is a student of knowledge, this indicates success and its achievement. High levels of knowledge. Fat, white cows in a dream indicate abundance of money. Whoever sees in a dream that he is buying a cow, this indicates a profitable trade or a sign of a long journey. Slaughtering a cow in a dream is a sign of the loss of a loved one or something valuable. Interpretation of slaughtering a cow in a dream. Slaughtering a cow in a dream has interpretations. Many, so if the dreamer is married, this may indicate her divorce from her husband, and if she is single, this means the failure of the marriage plan or its postponement. And whoever sees in a dream that he is slaughtering a cow and eating its meat, this indicates the marriage of a single person, profit from a merchant, and success for a seeker of knowledge. And whoever sees in a dream blood Cow: This indicates the death of worries, sorrows, fatigue, and illness. Therefore, we showed you the interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your feedback through the site and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.
